text: Hagi amanage huno Ra Anumzamo'a hie, Tairi vahe'mo'za kumira huvava hu'za vazankina, amanea zamatrenuge'za omanigahazanki, kna zamina zamazeri haviza hugahue. Na'ankure zamagra kora Israeli vahe'ene huvempa huza koganagna huta manigahune hu'naza kea amagera onte'za, miko vahera zamavare'za zagore ome zamatrage'za Idomu vahe'mo'za kazokazo eri'za vahe zamavare'za vu'naze.
